There's plenty of action as these trainers explore forests, jungles, cities and caves in search of Pokémon and adventure… sometimes working together, sometimes on their own! But can they foil the schemes of Team Rocket, a mysterious group of villains who want to use Pokémon for evil?

Nueno Meisuke, better known as Nuubee, is an exorcist who also happens to be the teacher for a 5th grade class at Doumori Elementary. While he uses many various exorcism techniques, his main weapon is his left hand, the Demon's Hand, which has the power of a chaotic demon sealed within it.

The series follows Nuubee and Doumori Class 5-3 though the many weird, insane, and downright silly supernatural encounters they face.

After being betrayed by his country, Jirou left his past as a hitman behind and returned to Japan. In his eyes, nothing mattered anymore… that is, until he met Nami, an active hitman seeking vengeance for her father's death. But she isn't just any hitman; Nami is a wallman! Jirou is then brought back to the underworld, agreeing to team up with Nami and help her seek revenge.

Listen up folks! I’m living my life with the Demon Queen!  
  
A normal powerless male protagonist is entrusted to look after the fallen Demon Queen Isabella. Depleted of her powers, Isabella is forced to camouflage as a human and suppress her regal status. Evil masterminds plot to dethrone the powerful Demon Queen in a medieval fantasy land.

A hitman and a marriage swindler set out on the world’s most grueling battle for marriage!

Gero is a young man from a clan of hitmen, which has been in existence for hundreds of years. As someone who’s never gone to school and lived his life dealing in the dark side of the business, he considers himself to have “no prospects with women” and marriage as “something not for him.”

However, one day, in fear that their lineage would dissolve, his clan warns Gero that if he doesn’t marry and produce an heir, they would have no choice but to…force his little sister into doing “that.” Driven to his wits’ end, Gero asks the target of his work, a marriage swindler, to…

description.ja: <毎週水曜更新>殺し屋×結婚詐欺師の世界一ハードな婚活バトル物語！数百年続く殺し屋一族の青年・下呂。学校にも行かず裏稼業で生きてきた彼にとって女性は「苦手で縁遠いもの」であり、結婚は「するべきではないもの」と考えていた。だがある日、血が絶えることを恐れた彼の実家は、下呂が結婚し子供を残さないならば、妹に「それ」を強制することを通告。困り果てた下呂は仕事のターゲットであった結婚詐欺師に…。
description.pt-br:
Um assassino de aluguel e uma vigarista de casamentos partem na batalha mais cansativa do mundo! 

Gero é um jovem de um clã de assassinos, que existe há centenas de anos. Como alguém que nunca foi à escola e viveu sua vida lidando com o lado sombrio do negócio, ele se considera “sem perspectivas com mulheres” e o casamento é “algo que não é para ele”. No entanto, um dia, com medo de que sua linhagem se dissolva, seu clã avisa Gero que, se ele não se casar e ter um herdeiro, eles não terão escolha a não ser… forçar sua irmãzinha a fazer “isso”. Levado ao extremo, Gero pede ao alvo de seu trabalho, uma vigarista de casamento, para que...

description.en:
I possessed a character in a novel I had never finished writing when I was in high school. And then now I have the body of a supporting character instead of the main character. It was a seven-year-old orphan girl with no name… Having to suffer the abuse of others, until I got really tired and ran away from that place. But I was captured and sold as a slave. I thought my life was over… But the person who saved me was the novel's most prominent villain, Henriette.

He treats the emperor like a puppet. A person who has a reputation for being extremely cruel in the original and has a hobby of cutting the throat of aristocrats. …Is he my biological father? But other than that terrible reputation, living with him wasn’t bad either.

"Okay, my daughter. You can do whatever you want. If you want something, everyone in the family will do what you want."

Wait… I didn't write a novel like that in the first place?

---

description.id:
Ketika saya masih seorang siswa sekolah menengah, saya sangat terpesona oleh novel itu sehingga saya berhenti menulis. Dan sekarang saya merasuki tubuh karakter pendukung, bukan karakter utama. Itu adalah gadis yatim piatu berusia 7 tahun tanpa nama... Harus menderita melemahkan orang lain, sampai saya benar-benar lelah dan lari dari tempat itu. Tapi saya ditangkap dan dijual sebagai budak. Saya pikir hidup saya sudah berakhir ...Tetapi orang yang menyelamatkan saya adalah penjahat paling menonjol dalam novel, Henriette. Dia memperlakukan kaisar seperti boneka. Seseorang yang memiliki reputasi sangat kejam dalam aslinya dan memiliki hobi memotong tenggorokan bangsawan. …Apakah itu ayah biologisku? Tapi selain reputasi buruk itu, tinggal bersamanya juga tidak buruk. “Baiklah, sayangku” “Kamu bisa melakukan apapun yang kamu mau. Jika Anda menginginkan sesuatu, semua orang di keluarga akan melakukan apa yang Anda inginkan.” Tunggu… Aku tidak menulis novel seperti itu sejak awal?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%8B%B9-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EA%B0%80%EC%9D%98-%EC%8B%A4%EC%84%B8-%EB%A7%89%EB%82%B4%EB%94%B8%EC%9E%85%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3441), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60083487)

* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/131595)
description.pt-br:
Eu possuía um personagem em um romance que parei de escrever por hobby quando estava no ensino médio. Minha mãe morreu em um acidente, e dizem que meu pai morreu logo depois de ir para a cadeia. Graças a isso, fiquei órfã aos sete anos sem nome. Enquanto morava na casa de outra pessoa, estava exausto de trabalhar e fui pego fugindo. Em seguida, vendido para s * salvar comerciantes. Eu queria saber se esta vida foi feita para ser arruinada. O respeitável Duque, o maior vilão do Império, comprou-me. "Ela tem 7 anos, mas era pequena e muito magra." Henriette, a pior vilã do original, cujo hobby é fazer todo mundo agir como uma marionete, pregar peças na família imperial e ameaçar o pescoço da aristocracia, descobriu-se que aquele homem assustador é meu verdadeiro pai que foi preso! Mas você parece um pouco diferente do vilão original. "Bem, duque..." "Não." “…Oh, pai?” "Isso também." "...uh, papai?" “Sim, minha filha. O que você quer ter hoje? Henriette, que eu achava assustadora, é mais amigável do que eu pensava. “Se alguém te incomodar de agora em diante, você tem que contar pro seu irmão mais velho, ok? Vou afogá-los no fundo do lago.” “Devo ver flores com minha irmãzinha hoje? Há tantas sereias ornamentais na estufa de vidro. Achei que você iria gostar, então peguei eu mesmo. Fiz um bom trabalho? “Essa garota lenta! Papai te ligou... Não eu não sou doido! Droga, não seja idiota! Ahhh! Sim! Estou errado! OK?" Os novos irmãos eram definitivamente vilões no original, mas são muito mais legais do que eu pensava. "Tu podes fazer o que quiseres. Qualquer pessoa da família, se você disser, ouvirá com atenção e fará o que você disser”. Mas é estranho. O romance que escrevi não era originalmente assim. “…Se você me prometer algumas coisas, eu ficarei com você de novo. Eu não vou deixar você. “Você pode me ver a qualquer hora sem hora marcada.” "Eu devo? Eu sempre posso fugir para um lugar onde você nunca mais me encontrará. Ele franziu as sobrancelhas. Se eu soubesse que uma pequena palavra de expressão teria causado uma reação tão terrível, eu teria ficado de boca fechada. Foi quando eu estava no meio do arrependimento, "Você está enganado. Você acha que eu vou deixar você ir em primeiro lugar, isso não deveria ser possível primeiro? "…That?" "Quem disse que eu deixaria você fugir?" …Não importa o quanto eu pense sobre isso, acho que entendi errado. "Se você realmente fugir, você não deve ser pego por mim novamente."

---

description.en: In a land where there is no magic, a land where the strong make the rules and weak have to obey, a land filled with alluring treasures and beauty, yet also filled with unforeseen danger. Xiao Yan, who has shown talents none had seen in decades, suddenly lost everything three years ago - his powers, his reputation, and his promise to his mother. What sorcery has caused him to lose all of his powers? And why has his fiancée suddenly shown up?

description.en: Yu Xiang unfortunately transmigrates into a merchant's daughter, who was mistakenly taken to the marquis manor at birth. She is immediately disabled, and carries the nickname of 'disaster star'. Helplessly, she can only cling to her older brother, the marquis, in hopes of surviving, and wait for the true master to return so she can give way. Years later, when the true master returns to the manor, Yu Xiang prepares to leave. however, she finds out her clinging technique is too good, that her marquis brother won't let her leave!
description.fr:
Yu Xiang donne, handicapée, échange son coeur avec celui de son frère. 
Après sa mort, elle se réincarne dans le corps d'une fille qui porte le même nom, est paralysée comme elle et qui est surnommée l'étoile malchanceuse. 
Yu Xiang réalise alors qu'elle est dans le roman qu'elle lisait avant de mourir. Synopsis du roman en question : Yu Xiang, fille de marchand a été échangée à la naissance avec la fille d'un Seigneur.
description.zh: 虞襄很不幸穿成了被抱到侯府的商家女，一来就双腿残废，脑袋上还顶着个‘丧门星’的称号。 无奈之下只得牢牢抱住侯爷哥哥的大腿，先把日子混下去，等正主儿回来就麻溜的让位。 几年之后正主儿回归，虞襄包袱款款准备走人，却发现抱大腿的技术太专业，侯爷哥哥不让走了！

description.en:
Aeryl Frey Brixia had lived all her life hiding behind a mask.

She was shunned by everyone including the father she craved affection from because of the ugly mark on her face that branded her a monster.

At the end of her miserable life, she was falsely accused of selling military weapons to the enemy nation and sentenced to execution…

The blade of the guillotine dropped and everything went black.

The next time she opened her eyes, she was in her room again as a young girl.

This time, she was determined things will be different. She will no longer be a puppet. She will no longer be manipulated.

And the first thing for her to do is to cooperate with the two officers leading the investigation against her father

description.en:
A man who has been reincarnated in a different world acquires the vocation of "pole master" in the new world! However, that special ability is not used to defeat enemies, nor to gain power, but to embrace the beautiful girls who appear one after another with all one's might! A unique story of conquering another world begins here!

The protagonist, “Sao” has been reborn with his memories from his past life. He’s born as a son of a rural villager, but his true identity is a reincarnated person with cheat abilities and the knowledge of the modern world. With the class “Rod Master,” he received as he grows up, and the many skills that came up with it, he can defeat enemies, help people, and even for sex.
description.id: Seorang pria yang telah bereinkarnasi di dunia lain memperoleh panggilan "master tongkat" di dunia baru!  Namun, kemampuan itu tidak digunakan untuk mengalahkan musuh, atau untuk mendapatkan kekuatan, melainkan untuk ngentot dengan gadis-gadis cantik yang terus muncul!
description.ja: ノクターンノベルズ大人気作！ 異世界転生したとある男は新天地で「竿師」なる天職を手にする！ だが、その異能は敵を倒すためでもなく、権力を手にするためでもなく、ただひたすらに全力で次々と現れる美少女を抱くことに使うのだ！ 異色の異世界制覇譚、ここに開幕！

description.en: There exists a secret organization that has members traveling across time to save people from their wrongful deaths. Namihira Bon accidentally learn about the Time Patrol, and is recruited as an apprentice member. Together with Rim, the patrol in charge of mentoring him , Bon goes to various historical periods to rescue innocent people, trying not to alter history in the process.

His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!
description.ru: В этом мире ведьмы охотятся за своей магией! В глубине леса ужасающая маджика и сильнейшая ведьма схлестнулись в бою не на жизнь, а на смерть. Но вдруг к битве присоединяется молодой парнишка. Его зовут Ити, и он обычный охотник. Но у него есть сила перевернуть весь мир магии с ног на голову в этом эпохальном магическом фэнтези об охоте!
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, as bruxas devem caçar sua magia! Nas profundezas da floresta, o terrível rei da magia e a bruxa mais forte estão presos em um combate mortal. Mas, de repente, um jovem garoto se junta à briga. Seu nome é Ichi e ele é apenas um caçador. Mas ele tem o poder de virar o mundo mágico de cabeça para baixo neste épico de fantasia de caça mágica!

Breed, một ông chú Long sư không chỉ bị sa thải khỏi công việc mà còn bị trục xuất khỏi đất nước... nhưng những con rồng lại yêu quý ông và đi theo ông!?

description.en: Matsuri Ichimatsu, Haruno Koume, and Sanguubashi Takezou are old friends with one thing in common: despite their good looks, they're incredibly unpopular with the ladies. But what does Polaris have to do with their fate? And will they ever get that harem they've always wanted?

Divinity x Sacrifice
A nonhuman marriage that mends a frozen heart.

"No matter where you are, if your life is meaningless..."

Rita is a lonely boy who was chosen to be the dragon's bride according to village tradition.
The existence of snowy mountain dragons, which has been passed down since ancient times, is now nothing more than a legend.  However, Rita cannot find a role in the village.  He accepts being sacrificed, even though he realizes it's a lie.

The one who saved Rita, who was wandering through a blizzard looking for the dragon and about to die, was Ignat, a beautiful dragon in human form.

Rita's eyes sparkle as she realizes that she was able to fulfill her role as a bride because of the presence of the dragon.  However, Ignat declares, ``I don't need a bride.''  Still unable to give up, Rita learns the secret of the ritual that transforms humans into dragons.

Silent dragon x fearless sacrifice
A fantasy BL about a non-human marriage that will soothe your frozen heart!

altTitles.ja: 支配少女くばるちゃん

description.en:
After fierce bullying, Yuuto Kiba wanted to die. On the verge of committing suicide, his fate changes rapidly when a strange and funky beautiful girl, Kubaru, tells him, “Give me your life”.

Make your life happy with love?! A slightly strange and psycho love drama.
description.ja:
熾烈ないじめの末に、もう死にたいと思っていた少年・木場優人（きばゆうと）。自殺する寸前に、奇妙なファンキー美少女・くばるに「君の人生を頂戴」と言われたことで、運命が目まぐるしく変わっていく。

ラブで君の人生を幸せにする？！ちょっと奇妙でサイコなラブドラマ。

description.en: Ban Suho, a guard who died after failing to protect the Princess from the assassins! Back in time two years with an unknown force!“ This time, I must…”Determined to protect the Princess this time and he sets out in search of the sealed power to become stronger. Indeed Ban Suho gains the power from an unknown force. Will he be able to protect the Princess?

On the way home from meeting her friend, Oh Hana meets 'Mama', a demon who feeds on human greed and lust.

In order to avoid this devilish crisis, she asks for help from a suspicious man, Luxria, whom she meets by chance, but this man makes a dangerous proposal.
"Do you want help? Then you should have sex with me."

친구를 만나고 집으로 돌아가던 중 인간의 색욕을 먹고 사는 악마, '음마'를 만나게 된 오하나.
위기를 모면하기 위해 우연히 만난 수상한 남자 '룩스리아'에게 도움을 요청하지만, 이 남자는 하나에게 위험한 제안을 한다.

description.en:
Yoshino Michi is 32 years old and married. Her relationship with her husband isn't bad. Just one thing is lacking: sex. One night, when she's having drinks with Niina Makoto, her 36-year-old senior from work, she finally opens her heart under the influence of alcohol and shares her worries about the lack of intimacy in her life. Niina reacts with a surprised face and says, while laughing somewhat lonelily, “I'm not having much luck with that either."  
  
[Official French Translation](https://www.kana.fr/series/corps-solitaires/)

In the world where the sea level has risen, the sea has already covered the continent.   
In the world where the land can not be found anymore, the family of the boy, 'Bota', lives in a small boat and wanders around.   
  
I am looking for another 'man' somewhere and I am safe in the rules that my father has set.
description.vi: Trong một thế giới nơi mực nước biển đã dâng cao và đại dương đã bao phủ toàn bộ lục địa, đất liền không còn tồn tại nữa. Gia đình của cậu bé tên Bota sống trên một con thuyền nhỏ và lang thang khắp nơi. Tôi đang tìm kiếm một "người" nào đó ở đâu đó và an toàn trong những quy tắc mà cha tôi đã đặt ra.
description.pt-br: O mundo foi submerso e monstros marinhos governam a terra. Será que Bota e sua família irão conseguir escapar desse inferno marítimo? E quem diabos é Kana...?!

description.fr: Nous sommes tous passés par là, ou devons y faire face, de quelle couleur sont vos souvenirs d'adolescence ?

description.en:
Growing up in the late 16th century Sengoku era Japan, Shinmen Takezou is shunned by the local villagers as a devil child due to his wild and violent nature. Running away from home with a fellow boy at age 17, Takezo joins the Toyotomi army to fight the Tokugawa clan at the Battle of Sekigahara. However, the Tokugawa win a crushing victory, leading to nearly three hundred years of Shogunate rule. Takezo and his friend manage to survive the battle and afterwards swear to do great things with their lives. However, after their paths separate, Takezo becomes a wanted criminal and must change his name and his nature in order to escape an ignoble death.  
  
**Awards:**
- Won the 24th Kodansha Manga Award in the general category in 2000.
- Won the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2002 
**Note:** was nominated for the 2003 Eisner Award in the Best Writer/Artist category.
description.es:
Creciendo en el Japón de la era Sengoku de finales del siglo XVI, Shinmen Takezou es rechazado por los aldeanos locales como un niño demonio debido a su naturaleza salvaje y violenta. A los 17 años, Takezou se escapa de casa con un compañero y se une al ejército Toyotomi para luchar contra el clan Tokugawa en la batalla de Sekigahara. Sin embargo, los Tokugawa obtienen una aplastante victoria, lo que da lugar a casi trescientos años de gobierno del Shogunato. Takezou y su amigo consiguen sobrevivir a la batalla y después juran hacer grandes cosas con sus vidas. Sin embargo, cuando sus caminos se separan, Takezou se convierte en un criminal buscado y debe cambiar su nombre y su naturaleza para escapar de una muerte innoble.  
  
**Premios:**
    - Ganó el 24º Premio Kodansha de Manga en la categoría general en 2000.
    - Ganó el Premio Cultural Tezuka Osamu en 2002
    **Nota:** fue nominado al Premio Eisner 2003 en la categoría de Mejor Escritor/Artista.

altTitles.en: I'll Become a Villainess That Will Go Down in History: The More Villainous I Become, the More the Prince Dotes on Me
I'll Become a Villainess Who Will Go Down in History: The More Villainous I Become, the More the Prince Dotes on Me

description.en:
"I don't want a world full of only pretty things! I'll become a villainess who will go down in history!!"

For someone who hates a typical "good girl" heroine, I was reincarnated as my favorite otome-game villainess! Since my wish has been granted, I'll be the number one villainess who will go down in history! For that to happen, I need to be strong and intelligent! Also, although I'm just... doing my best, the more of a villainess I become, the more I'm liked by the Prince?! Can I really go down in history―?!
description.id:
"Aku tidak butuh dunia yang dipenuhi oleh keindahan! Yang kuinginkan hanyalah menjadi seorang villainess yang akan dikenang dalam sejarah!!".
Sebagai seseorang yang sangat membeci tipikal heroine yang "baik hati", Aku telah bereinkarnasi sebagai seorang villainess didalam game otome favoritku!, karena keinginanku telah terkabulkan, maka aku akan berusaha untuk menjadi seorang villainess nomer satu yang akan dikenang dalam sejarah!.
Agar hal itu bisa terjadi, maka aku haruslah kuat dan juga cerdas!
Tapi walau aku sudah berusaha keras untuk menjadi vilainess yang kuinginkan... Entah kenapa sang pangeran malah semakin tertarik kepadaku?! Kira-kira bisa tidak ya aku menjadi seorang villainess yang dikenang dalam sejarah....

description.en: Keita has two step-sisters (without blood-relation) who love him in a lustful way and have no problems expressing it, they even like to compete over it; much to the laughs of his friends (which he usually endures without problems). One day they come to his school to give him his lunch, he gets annoyed due to the atmosphere and explodes on them, to counter attack his anger they confess their tender feelings for him in front of everyone and leave. Feeling sorry he chases after them and says that he'll study hard in order to get in the same highschool as them.
description.it: La storia di Kissxsis inizia con lo studente Keita Suminoe alle prese con gli esami di ingresso per le scuole superiori. Ad aiutarlo ci sono le sue sorelle gemelle più grandi di lui. Le ragazze, Ako e Riko, non hanno alcun legame di sangue con Keita, non fanno nulla per nascondere i propri sentimenti amorosi nei confronti del ragazzo, e si lasciano andare a effusioni ed avances anche in pubblico. I genitori dei tre ragazzi incoraggiano Keita ad accettare le attenzioni di una delle due sorelle, e Keita nonostante l'imbarazzo non disdegna l'interesse delle due ragazze nei suoi confronti. Ako e Riko, nonostante siano tecnicamente rivali fra loro, sono spesso unite e complici nell'escogitare piani per allontanare Keita da qualunque altra ragazza possa girare intorno a lui…
description.pt: Kiss x Sis conta a história de Keita Suminoe, um jovem estudante do ensino fundamental. Ele está vivendo em uma casa com seus pais e suas meio-irmãs gêmeas, Ako e Riko, que o beijam e o assediam sempre competindo para ver quem mostra mais amor por ele. Embora se considerem irmãos eles não compartilham relação sanguínea; seus pais se casaram enquanto eles estavam na infância. Ainda assim, a relação incomoda Keita profundamente, já que seus pais permitem essa relação, e visto que foram criados juntos, e escandaliza à grande parte dos que vêm a saber desta. As gêmeas, contudo, são insistentes, e fazem o possível e o impossível para ficar com ele. Nessa conjuntura, entram outros personagens que possuem esse mesmo interesse, e a trama se desenrola em cima da disputa por Keita.
description.pt-br: Keita tem duas meias-irmãs (sem parentesco) que o amam de uma forma lasciva e não têm problemas em expressar isso, elas até gostam de competir por isso; para as risadas de seus amigos (o que ele geralmente suporta sem problemas). Um dia, elas vêm à escola dele para lhe dar seu almoço, ele fica irritado devido à atmosfera e explode com elas, para contra-atacar sua raiva, elas confessam seus sentimentos ternos por ele na frente de todos e vão embora. Sentindo pena, ele corre atrás delas e diz que vai estudar muito para entrar na mesma escola que elas.

description.pl: Leo Lombardi jest kierowcą wyścigowym L1 w Team Zeus. Jest młody, przystojny i ma talent do jazdy, który wzbudza zazdrość. W tym sukcesie uczestniczy również chłopak Leo, J.J., który tak się składa, że jest mechanikiem w Team Zeus. Wszystko wskazuje na to, że Leo zdobędzie mistrzostwo drugi rok z rzędu. Ale kiedy J.J. nagle zrywa z Leo, sprawy zaczynają iść na źle. Wraz z odejściem fortuny (talizmanu szczęścia) Leo, jego życie zawodowe (i osobiste) zaczyna cierpieć. Jak J.J. pozbędzie się tego małpiego rozumu w swoich planach i odzyska miano mistrza, które kiedyś miał...?

description.en:
Noh Ga Jang has led the life of a warrior ever since he remembers, isolated from the world and illiterate to top it all, until he meets a beautiful woman who steals his heart. He marries her and they live a life of bliss, and she gets pregnant with his children. Against all odds, she unexpectedly dies during childbirth, leaving Noh alone with their newborn triplets. Desperate, saddened, but not broken, Noh swears to the heavens that he'll become an exemplary man to raise the invaluable treasures his wife left him.  
  
Watch the mighty warrior Noh become a Peerless Dad, and slowly realize in the way just how powerful he is for the sake of his children.

description.ko:
하늘의 뜻을 아니, 그 누가 아비父에 견주리오! 
고아로 떠돌다 운 좋게 스승을 만나 특급 해결사로 이름을 날리던 노가장.
사랑하는 여인을 만나 이름대로 가장家長이 된다는 기쁨도 잠시, 하루아침에 핏덩이 세쌍둥이를 홀로 키워야 하는 신세가 되었다. 아비는 그 어떤 경우라도 제 새끼의 입에 먹을 걸 넣어 줘야 하는 존재인 법! 노가장은 위험천만한 낭인 생활을 때려치우고 천룡회 갑급 무사가 되어  자식새끼들 잘 먹이고 입히고자 한다. 하지만 억지로 나간 출장 임무는 목숨이 위험하기만 하고 그 사이 사방에선 그의 아이들을 눈독 들이기 시작하는데…… 기다려라, 내 새끼들아! 여기 아비가 간다! 
아버지, 노가장의 좌충우돌 무협 액션&육아 일지!

* 원작소설 <지천명아비무쌍>

description.pt:
Noh Ga Jang teve a vida de um guerreiro desde que ele tem memória, isolado do mundo e analfabeto, até conhecer uma mulher bonita que rouba seu coração. Ele se casa com ela e vive uma vida de folia, e ela fica grávida dos seus filhos. Inesperadamente, ela morre durante o parto, deixando o Noh apenas com seus trigêmeos recém-nascidos. Desesperado, triste, mas não quebrado, Noh proclama aos céus que ele se tornará um homem exemplar para criar os tesouros inestimáveis que sua esposa o deixou.  
  
Vamos testemunhar o guerreiro implacável Noh se tornando um pai incomparável, percebendo o quão poderoso ele pode ser pelo bem dos seus filhos.

description.ru:
История бесподобного отца, которому известна воля небес. Автор Но Гён Чхан широко известен по манхве Красная Буря, но если вам нужна другая причина для чтения, то это удивительная история приключений мастера боевых искусств, включающая свадьбу, заботы отца и битвы. Она во многом похожа на Красную Бурю: крутой мастер, главный герой, беспокоящийся о своей семье, трагическая предыстория. Обязательно к прочтению для каждого, кому понравилась Красная Буря.

description.en:
Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. 

Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

altTitles.en: I'm in Love With the Older Girl Next Door
I Love The Older Girl Next Door.

altTitles.pt-br: Eu amo a garota mais velha da casa ao lado.

description.en: There's this beautiful, bubbly, film-loving girl who's three years older than me: her name's Shia, and she lives right next door! I'm madly in love with her, and I needed some way to see her! I settled on asking her for movie recommendations, and now I get to meet her every Wednesday! I want to know more about her, and tell her how I feel... but I just can't get the message across! Enjoy this lopsided rom-com brought to you by the author of "The Girl I Like Forgot Her Glasses" and "Paper Braver", Koume Fujichika!
description.pt-br:
**Minha Vizinha Cinéfila**

Tem essa garota linda, super animada e apaixonada por filmes que mora bem ao lado: o nome dela é Shia, e ela é três anos mais velha que eu! Sou completamente apaixonado por ela, e precisava de um jeito de vê-la! Decidi pedir recomendações de filmes, e agora a encontro toda quarta-feira! Quero saber mais sobre ela e contar o que sinto... mas simplesmente não consigo me expressar! Curta essa comédia romântica desequilibrada do mesmo autor de "A Garota de Quem Gosto Esqueceu os Óculos" e "Paper Braver".

title.en: Shin Koihime Musou - Otome Ryouran Sangokushi Engi

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

The series has sold over 8.3 million copies! The gold standard of zombie manga, "I Am a Hero," is now available in a "complete edition" with a new cover design, reprinted color pages from the serialization, and over 80 pages of new artwork in the final 22 volumes! Witness the new ending of the story. 

He is 35 year old who spends his time as an assistant to a mangaka, sometimes escaping into delusion in order to win over the agonizing reality. One day, however, a mysterious infection begins to spread without him noticing...and the real world begins to break down...⁉ 

He wanders into a world where the ordinary and the extraordinary, the mundane and the insane intersect. A personal survival panic horror story! 

[Official English](https://www.darkhorse.com/Books/25-142/I-Am-a-Hero-Omnibus-Volume-1-TPB)

---  
- **Won the 58th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2013**

---

- Adapted into a Live Action film in 2016. Link to the [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=24660) Page
description.pl:
Hideo Suzuki to 35­‑latek pracujący jako asystent znanego twórcy mang. Na pozór wydaje się zwyczajnym człowiekiem, balansuje jednak na granicy choroby psychicznej, ma olbrzymie problemy z funkcjonowaniem w społeczeństwie i kontaktach z innymi ludźmi. Jak ktoś taki poradzi sobie w świecie opanowywanym przez zombie?  
 Mangę charakteryzuje bardzo poważne podejście do tematu i zorientowanie na psychikę bohatera oraz analizę ludzkiej osobowości.  
 Yumi - 25 maja 2011
description.vi:
Như các bạn đã từng biết là trong các bộ truyện kinh dị đa số các nhân vật chính đều rất mạnh mẽ đẹp trai, phong độ và được nhiều gái theo v…v…! Nhưng đó là trong mấy truyện zombie bình thường thôi!
Trong bộ I am a hero này thì main của chúng ta lại là một thằng bất tài vô dụng, bị chính bạn gái của mình sau khi biến thành zombie cắn, cậu ta chỉ biết chạy chạy và chạy… 

Sau đó trải qua nhiều biến cố thì main đã trưởng thành và ra dáng đàn ông hơn trước....
 Đây là một bộ truyện hay mang hơi hướng kinh dị, giật gân, tâm lý,...
description.pt-br: Hideo Suzuki é um assistente de mangaká de 35 anos de idade lutando para ser um herói em sua própria vida, dividido pelo trabalho na série em que é assistente "lime light" e com uma série nova ao mesmo tempo, equilibrando seu relacionamento com sua namorada e seus próprios delírios. No entanto, tão difícil como Hideo pode imaginar, o mundo parece ter um conjunto de planos diferentes para ele; maquinações sinistras e obscuras que derrubam completamente a sua realidade e como ele a vê.

altTitles.ja: 師匠、あと49回死んでください

description.en:
When the powerless thirteenth prince became emperor, he gave his tutor, Yo Yohwa, poison. His reason being his death at the hands of his own master in countless previous lives. The poisoned Yo Yohwa then regresses to an earlier time together with the prince and is determined to get on his good side this time in order to escape. However, the prince already discovered the truth…

“This is crazy. You killed me in the previous lives, and you neglected me in another. Now you’re acting all nice. Are you trying to get away?”

Eigo Nitta, new student in Hoyo high school, is enrolled in the baseball team. Talented as fast pitcher but lacking in term of technique, Eigo Nitta aims to be the new pitcher of the team. He has to face many opponents, which creates an atmosphere of competition in the baseball team. However he and his teammates will have to find a way to solve the rivalry among the baseball team in order to go to Koshien tournament.

Ishidaira is a delinquent who visited the library for the first time since elementary school. But then, he was pointed out by Hayasemaru and Shirai, who works at the library, that he has not returned a book that he borrowed ten years ago. A manga about how Ishidaira went from trying to borrow a book from a library to working there instead.
description.pt-br: Ishidaira é um delinquente que visitou a biblioteca pela primeira vez desde o ensino fundamental. Mas então, ele foi apontado por Hayasemaru e Shirai, que trabalha na biblioteca, que ele não devolveu um livro que pegou emprestado dez anos atrás. Um mangá sobre como Ishidaira passou de tentar pegar um livro emprestado de uma biblioteca para trabalhar lá.

description.en: Junghyun Kim, who had a normal upbringing, and his roommate Homo Kim.This is the sensitive, embarrassing story of these two who are different in every way.

altTitles.en: TSUYOSHI: The one who no one can win against

altTitles.ja: TSUYOSHI 誰にも勝てない、アイツには

altTitles.ja-ro: TSUYOSHI: Daremo Katenai, Aitsu ni wa

altTitles.th: Tsuyoshi ไอ้หนุ่มหมัดพิฆาตลูกป๋องแป๋ง

description.en: A super-powerful guy keeps defeating everyone around him, even though he doesn't like fighting.

The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun recieves a letter… from himself? The letter was from Shun 25 years ago for his future self. The letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

The cute and funny adventures of a boy and his best friend.  
  
Note: The story starts at chapter 42. The earlier chapters contain insert art of the characters by the author.
description.pl: Opowieść o przygodach czwórki przyjaciół. Zbieżność w numeracji rozdziałów wynika z zastosowania odmiennego niż angielska grupa systemu liczbowania dodatków – tłumaczenia są mniej więcej na tym samym etapie.
description.zh: 幼儿园里的一次合影是见一、展正希一辈子情谊的起点。一起长大的发小在校园里又遇见了贺天、莫关山这些好朋友。《19天》不仅仅是四人轻松愉快的校园日常，也是男孩们相互理解帮助最终成长的青春物语。

title.en: Bishu no Daichi Fukushu ~Fukushuu no tame ni Kao wo Suteta Onna~

altTitles.ja: 美醜の大地～復讐のために顔を捨てた女～

altTitles.en: A Woman Who Abandoned Her Face for Revenge

altTitles.vi: Vì Hận Tái Sinh ~Người phụ nữ vì phục thù mà từ bỏ gương mặt của mình~

description.en:
A woman who was robbed of her family by bullying is reborn as another person, and she devotes herself to revenge from hell! , Because of her ugly appearance, she was badly bullied at a girls' school. The leader of bullying is Ayako Takashimazu, the daughter of a large company. Hana, who was accused of theft by her, was forced to leave school...!?

(from mangaupdates)
description.ja:
いじめによってすべてを奪われた女が別人に生まれ変わり、地獄の復讐に身を投じる！

昭和20年、太平洋戦争が終わりかけていた時代、樺太（からふと）で生まれ育った少女・市村ハナは、醜い容姿のため女学校で凄惨ないじめを受けていた。いじめのリーダー格は大会社の令嬢・高島津絢子。彼女によって泥棒の濡れ衣を着せられたハナは、退学に追い込まれてしまう。やがてソ連軍が空襲を開始し、樺太から北海道へ逃れる船に乗り込んだハナ一家だったが、いじめグループによって船から追い出されてしまい……。
description.vi:
Một cô gái với cuộc đời bị lấy đi tất cả mọi thứ do bị bắt nạt, vu oan đã tái sinh thành một người khác và cô quyết định trả thù tất cả những ai đã góp phần đẩy cuộc đời mình vào bước đường cùng!
Ichimura Hana, một cô gái sinh ra và lớn lên ở Karafuto, bị bắt nạt dã man tại một trường nữ sinh vì ngoại hình xấu xí của mình. Cầm đầu nhóm bắt nạt cô là Takashimazu Ayako, thiên kim tiểu thư của công ty sản xuất giấy lớn nhất Karafuto thời bấy giờ. Sau một lần bị vu cáo là kẻ trộm, Hana đã bị đuổi học.
Một thời gian sau, trong một cuộc di tản bởi trận không kích của quân Liên Xô, gia đình Hana đáng ra đã lên được một con tàu để thoát khỏi Karafuto đến Hokkaido, nhưng cả nhà cô đã bị xua đuổi khỏi tàu bởi chính sự vu cáo của bè lũ bắt nạt đó...

description.en: One of Zhenhua's trilogies, this love is unforgettable, yet no one knows it. Because of a single, lasting encounter when she was younger, Luo Zhi has had a crush on Sheng Huainan for eleven years. His appearance was so radiant, and since then, Luo Zhi's diary has become a one-sided love story that belongs to her alone. Because of Sheng Huainan, Luo Zhi followed him all the way and was admitted to his university. Because of multiple encounters, Luo Zhi and Sheng Huainan finally approached each other...

altTitles.ja: 飯だけ食ってレベルアップ

altTitles.th: กินจุทะลุเลเวล

description.en:
Kang Minhyuk suffers from a rare disorder that makes it impossible for him to stop eating. Despite strict diet and exercise, Minhyuk’s weight is now life-threatening. As a last resort, his doctor recommends a unique treatment—Athenae, a VR game where one can eat as much as they want without consequence. Crispy fried chicken! Scrumptious samgyetang! Inside Athenae, all food tastes real, but earning it is no cakewalk. In order to live, Minhyuk must go on the ultimate fantasy gourmet adventure!

description.id:
Menderita penyakit langka di mana hanya ada dua orang penderita di seluruh dunia, Minhyuk harus hidup sambil mengontrol nafsu makannya. Segala cara sudah dicoba untuk mengurangi berat badan Minhyuk, namun itu hanya semakin membuatnya lapar hingga dokter pribadinya menyarankan 'Athenae'. Sebuah VR Game di mana pemainnya bisa makan sepuasnya di dalam sana tanpa khawatir berat badan naik. Begitulah petualangan Minhyuk dimulai, tentu saja ditemani makanan-makanan lezat pada setiap quest-nya!

description.it:
personaggio principale è colpito da una rara condizione che colpisce solo due persone in tutto il mondo, la bulimia. Organizza i suoi pasti quotidiani per sopravvivere, ma la sua speranza di sopravvivenza si affievolisce con il passare dei giorni. Consulta un medico, che gli suggerisce di giocare al gioco della realtà alternativa "Athenae", dove può mangiare quanto vuole senza ingrassare. Gioca per salvarsi la vita e crescere in forza non facendo altro che mangiare! Una vita fantastica da gourmet!

description.ja:
サクサクのチキン、伸びるチーズのピザ、夜中の1時に食べるラーメン！ ただおいしいものが食べたいだけなのに… 「暴食欠如症」どれだけ食べても食欲が満たされない奇病。 俺はこの病気のせいで体重170キロの巨漢になり、とうとう生命まで危なくなってしまう！ そこで新しい治療法として仮想現実ゲーム「アテネ」をすることに。 そこでは味が感じられて、おまけにラーメン100杯食べても太らない世界！ たくさん食べたい一心でプレイしていただけなのに、どんどんレベルアップしていって…!?

전 세계에 단 두 명만 존재하는 희귀병 폭식 결여증에 걸린 주인공. 
하루하루 살기 위해 먹는 걸 조절하며 살아가고 있지만 희망이 없어보인다, 
의사의 추천으로 시작하게 된 가상현실게임 '아테네'에서는 음식을 마음껏 먹고도 살이 찌지 않는데.
살기 위해 게임을 하며 성장하는 식도락 판타지 라이프!

Во всём мире только два человек подвержены этому редкому заболеванию.
Для того, чтобы выжить мне приходится следить за тем, что я ем. В виртуальной игре "Афины", к которой я присоединился по рекомендации врача, я никак не могу набрать вес, даже если ем до отвала.
Фантазия гурмана, где тебе приходится есть, чтобы выжить.

description.th:
คังมินฮยอก เป็นผู้ป่วยโรคกินไม่หยุด หนึ่งในโรคหายากที่มีแค่ไม่กี่คนในโลก
เขาต้องออกกำลังกายและควบคุมอาหารในแต่ละวันอย่างยากลำบากเพื่อให้มีชีวิตรอด
แต่แล้วหมอก็แนะนำวิธีการรักษาแบบใหม่ด้วยการเล่นเกมออนไลน์เสมือนจริง ""อาเธเน่"" ที่ผู้เล่นสามารถรับรู้รสชาติอาหารในเกมได้
เรื่องราวการผจญภัยแสนอร่อยชวนน้ำลายสอของมินฮยอกจึงเริ่มต้นขึ้น!

description.zh:
敏赫身高185cm，他控制食量，每天运动4个小时，可他的体重却只能控制在170kg。他家境优渥、成绩优异，各方面都很完美，除了体重。这都是因为他患有罕见的暴食性缺失症。不管吃多少东西，他都无法得到满足。完美体验味觉感受的虚拟现实游戏——雅典，也许是可以解救他的最后一把钥匙？！

description.zh-hk:
主角患有全世界只有兩名患者的
罕見疾病——「暴食型飽足感缺失症」，
為了活下去，他每日努力控制飲食，
卻仍看不見希望。

在醫生的建議下，
他進入了虛擬實境遊戲《雅典奈》，
在遊戲裡，就算盡情大吃也不會變胖。
為了活下去而開始玩遊戲的他，
展開了一段美食雲集的奇幻人生!

description.en:
Gundam EXA (ガンダム EXA) is a manga written by Tomohiro Chiba and illustrated by Kōichi Tokita, published by Kadokawa Shoten and serialized in Gundam Ace magazine in 2011. Being Gundam Ace's 10th Anniversary Project, it is tied in with the arcade and PS3 Game Mobile Suit Gundam: Extreme Vs. Full Boost.  
  
The story takes place in unnamed timeline, where humanity has highly advanced technology. However, the human population is decreasing and it seems that they're on their way to extinction.  
  
The protagonists are Leos Alloy, Sthesia Awar and their Haro. They work on a Jupiter base called "Jupiter X", using "General Answer" (or "GA") which contains a massive repository of data about the previous eras of humanity, Leos travels to the Earths' of the previous eras in an effort to collect data that might give them a hint for the evolution of mankind.
A graduate from the school of hard knocks, hit man Ogami faces his greatest challenge yet…middle school!

title.en: Kotowarenai Kaichou wa Tomoe-kun ni Dake shite Agetai

altTitles.ja: 断れない会長は友江くんにだけしてあげたい

altTitles.ja-ro: Kotowarenai Kaichou wa Tomoe-kun ni Dake shite Agetai

altTitles.en: The President Who Can’t Say No Wants to Do It Only for Tomoe-Kun

description.en:
The student council president, who is big in all sorts of ways, can't refuse when asked to do something.

She tries her best to do whatever it takes to help the students, so Vice President Tomoe-kun stops her from going too far.

But all she wants is to be asked for a naughty request from Tomoe-kun...
description.ja:
いろいろでっかい会長は頼まれると断れない。
生徒のためになることなら何でも一生懸命叶えてあげようとしてしまうので、
副会長の友江くんは度が過ぎないように阻止する。
でも会長は友江くんからだけはえっちなお願いをされたくて…。

title.en: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni - Kataribanashi-hen Comic Anthology EX.

altTitles.ja: ひぐらしのなく頃に 語咄し編 コミックアンソロジーEX．

altTitles.ru: Когда Плачут Цикады: Глава о Сборнике Историй

description.en:
Kataribanashi-hen (語咄し編 Storytelling Chapter) is a compilation of winning fan stories for the Higurashi no Naku Koro ni series from the Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Contest (ひぐらしのなく頃に大賞).

Notably, the eight artists involved with the 10 main arcs of the manga all illustrated for at least one of the stories included in the novel volumes, while Karin Suzuragi and Jiro Suzuki even illustrated the cover arts for the manga volumes and Yutori Houjyou and Mimori each did the manga adaptation of a story. Among the other artists, Kei Natsumi, Soichiro, and Akai Higasa would later be involved with other works from 07th Expansion including Umineko no Naku Koro ni and Rose Guns Days. 

Some stories were adapted into a manga series named Kataribanashi-hen Comic Anthology EX (語咄し編 コミックアンソロジーEX Kataribanashi-hen Komikkuansorojī EX).

altTitles.ja: ロード・エルメロイⅡ世の事件簿

altTitles.vi: Bí ẩn trong thế giới ma thuật

description.en:
When Lord El-Melloi II, the later Waver Velvet, gets asked to claim his inheritance over Adra Castle, he travels there with his apprentice Gray to do so. But they are not the only ones called that way. The will of the previous owner states that the assembled contestants—including Luviagelita Edelfelt—must compete in a game of wits to win the castle.  
  
Based on the light novel of the same name.
description.ru: Часовая Башня — центр магического мира и штаб-квартира «Ассоциации магов», хранящей секреты бесценных таинств. Преподающий здесь лорд факультета современной магии, Эль-Меллой II, по стечению определённых обстоятельств оказывается втянут в борьбу за наследие Замка Разделения, Адра. Только разгадавший тайну ангельских имён, что были даны всем приглашённым и встречаются в нём повсюду, сможет получить его «наследие». Однако даже для высокопоставленных магов Часовой Башни это дело оказалось не простым решением головоломки, а началом волшебного, но в то же время печального инцидента.С этого дела началось досье лорда Эль-Меллоя II, в котором переплелись магия и таинства, иллюзии и загадки...

description.en:
A fan comic posted to r/AzureLane by [u/Cpl\_Ethane](https://www.reddit.com/user/Cpl_Ethane), Akagi^2 is based on the mobile game Azur Lane, which is about anthropomorphised WWII ships.   
This series is focused on Akagi-chan and her antics around the base. Note that this is drawn in an "American newspaper" style, and is read top to bottom, left to right.  
  
Artist's twitter: <https://twitter.com/11975MHz>  
Artist's patreon: <https://patreon.com/CplEFComix>
